history.proof: intros n. induction n. - intros x Hx. hauto l: on depth: 3use: le_n_S, le_refl, S, Lindenbaum_included_n_m. - intros x Hx. hauto l: on depth: 3use: le_n_S, le_refl, S, Lindenbaum_included_n_m.

exceptions.exn: In environment A : Type CA : Countable A init : Ensemble A P : Ensemble A -> Prop x : A Hx : Ensembles.In A (LindenbaumChain 0) x Unable to unify "Ensembles.In A (LindenbaumChain 0) x" with "Ensembles.In A LindenbaumConstruction x".
Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.
Not an inductive goal with 2 constructors.
Unable to find an instance for the variable x.

In environment A : Type CA : Countable A init : Ensemble A P : Ensemble A -> Prop n : nat IHn : Included A (LindenbaumChain n) LindenbaumConstruction x : A Hx : Ensembles.In A (LindenbaumChain (S n)) x Unable to unify "forall x : A, Ensembles.In A (LindenbaumChain ?M2024) x -> Ensembles.In A (LindenbaumChain (S n)) x" with "exists n : nat, LindenbaumChain n x".

In environment A : Type CA : Countable A init : Ensemble A P : Ensemble A -> Prop n : nat IHn : Included A (LindenbaumChain n) LindenbaumConstruction x : A Hx : Ensembles.In A (LindenbaumChain (S n)) x Unable to unify "S ?M2024 <= S ?M2025" with "exists n : nat, LindenbaumChain n x".

In environment A : Type CA : Countable A init : Ensemble A P : Ensemble A -> Prop n : nat IHn : Included A (LindenbaumChain n) LindenbaumConstruction x : A Hx : Ensembles.In A (LindenbaumChain (S n)) x Unable to unify "Ensembles.In A (LindenbaumChain (S n)) x" with "Ensembles.In A LindenbaumConstruction x".

original: intros n. induction n. - intros x Hx. apply Hx. - intros x Hx. right. split. + apply Lindenbaum_included_n_m with (m := S n). apply Le.le_n_S, Le.le_refl. + apply Hx.
